title: The Beacons and beyond
creator_credit: David Lochner, Glyn Jones and British Transport Films
brief_description: South Wales is an area of great natural beauty - from the Brecon Beacons in the north of the area to the rugged coastline of Pembrokeshire in the south. The attractions for the holidaymaker are shown.
creator_credit_for_label: David Lochner, Glyn Jones and British Transport Films
